snippet: The murder of Kathryn Johnston, which is described in the cover story for the July 1 issue of the magazine, also inspired "The Ballad of Kathryn Johnston," a protest song by Shawn Mullins.
abstract: The murder of Kathryn Johnston, which is described in the cover story for the July 1 issue of the magazine, also inspired "The Ballad of Kathryn Johnston," a protest song by Shawn Mullins.

headline.main: Shot by Police, Remembered by Balladeer
